title: Strangeways Versus the Blood Brothers
description: Partnered with her nemesis, the infernally attractive Mr. Warren Fox, ghosthunter and necromancer, Amelia Strangeways must prove her value to the Hunter Council by ridding New York City of the vile Blood Brothers, the ghosts of five Templar Knights who renounced their faith and require the blood of the living to sustain solid form.___Ladies and gentlemen, brace yourselves for a steampunk e-serial event you won’t want to miss! STRANGEWAYS VERSUS THE BLOOD BROTHERS is the first full length novel in the STRANGEWAYS series which will be released…in episodes. That’s right, STRANGEWAYS will harken back to the original serialized fiction of the Victorian Era wherein the likes of Dickens was published. The story will be compiled into paperback format at the end of 2014.
author: Judith Graves
